name: Ethan

services.title: UX Design
services.description: My experience working for startups has given me a crash course in effective user design. This skill is both fundamental and essential to the success of any product.

services.title: Communication
services.description: My talent for UX design is an extension of my passion for effective communication. A good interface is like an essay, and I've learned to target the right audience and speak to them

services.title: Web Design
services.description: Using the latest technologies, I build responsive websites that look great on any device. I also provide ongoing support and maintenance as well as SEO services.

services.title: Full Stack Development
services.description: I have experience building full stack applications using React, Node, and MongoDB. I also have experience with Python and Django. These skills have worked hand in hand with my web design

aboutpara: I am a web developer with 5 years industry experience. I have worked on a wide range of projects from small business websites to large scale web applications. I have a passion for creating beautiful, intuitive, and functional websites. I have a strong background in web development and design, and I enjoy working with clients to bring their ideas to life. I am a self-starter and a quick learner, and I am always looking for new opportunities to grow and learn. I have also decided to further my career with a BS in CS at the University of Utah, which I will graduate from this fall

resume.tagline: Software Engineer, Web Designer, People person
resume.description: My skill in Web Development includes a deep knowledge of HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. I have experience with React, Node, and MongoDB. I also have experience with Python and Django. These skills have worked hand in hand with my web design

experiences.bullets: Designed and implemented the company website, Upgraded old website and integrated Wordpress quickly and to the great satisfaction of our clients

experiences.position: Systems Analyst at Bear River Mutual
experiences.bullets: Learned Manuscript designed in short order, Became senior technical analyst after two months

education.universityPara: I started at the U as a pre-med student and completed two years in those courses before realizing my during-school-job was a better fit and had greater growth. I focused on Computer Science to aid my growing skills in web and web app development. I expect to graduate this fall
